item.title: OpenSource = options and options - Part 1
item.author: ratnadeepronnie@gmail.com (Ratnadeep Bhattacharyya)
item.description: Part 1 of my what I like in opensource and opensouce technologies I work with. As being a technophile, Opensource is like oxygen in tech field for me. Opensource plays a major role for being a technophile I am today and without opensource I may not be what I am. Thanks to gaints for releasing there tools and softwares as opensource. open-source (noun) denoting software for which the original source code is made freely available and may be redistributed and modified.
